reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is comfortable, with one noting it's professional enough for work. They appreciate its flattering design that hugs the body, and one customer mentions it strikes a balance between style and functionality. The dress receives positive feedback for its material quality, length, and true-to-size measurements.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars sexy long dress with a great fit!
items.body: I love this dress! soft, true to size, fits well, easy care. Length is perfect, I am size Large or sometimes medium, I weigh 150, am 38C and the Large fit me perfect. The material is a medium thickness, silky and not see through. It is stretchy so if you have a bigger bust, belly or bootie, it will stretch. This is a perfect dress for going out, work, anything. The print is beautiful and stylish. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leopard print is in! Get it!
items.body: This dress is so cute! 5’8 150 and size M is perfect. I layered with a shirt over it and wore as a skirt as well! So many compliments. Read more

items.author: Ashley Brown-Davis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Comfortable, and Perfect for Warmer Weather – Great Workwear Find!
items.body: I bought the Floerns Women's Leopard Print Draped Collar Dress to wear to work and I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable and flattering it is. The draped collar adds a nice touch of elegance, and the leopard print gives it just the right amount of personality without being too loud for a professional setting. The material is lightweight and flowy, making it perfect for spring and summer. It feels breathable throughout the day, which is especially important during warmer months. I love that it strikes a balance between style and comfort, which isn’t always easy to find in work-appropriate dresses. I ordered an extra large because I have a curvier bottom half, and while the dress fits nicely overall, it is a bit more fitted around my hips since there is no stretch in the fabric. If you’re in between sizes or prefer a looser fit through the hips, I’d recommend sizing up. What I appreciate most is that this dress doesn’t cling and still looks polished without needing a belt or extra styling. It’s easy to throw on with a pair of flats or heels, and I’ve already received a few compliments on it. I’ll definitely be purchasing it in another color! Pros: Lightweight and flowy fabric – ideal for spring/summer Stylish design with a flattering draped collar Professional enough for work but versatile for casual wear Great print that adds interest without being over-the-top Cons: No stretch – snugger fit on the hips for curvier figures Consider sizing up if you prefer a looser silhouette Final Thoughts: A great wardrobe addition for anyone looking for a comfortable, polished, and stylish dress for work or everyday wear. I highly recommend it—especially if you’re shopping for something seasonally appropriate and easy to style. Read more
items.author: MsCatrinaRayanne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Red, Brown, Black Ink, Apricot, Black and White, Light Pink, Light Yellow, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
